featuredJobs.title: Full Stack Developer
featuredJobs.description: Acme Inc. is seeking a Full Stack Developer to join our team. The ideal candidate will have experience with React, Node.js, and MongoDB.
requirements: 3+ years of experience in web development
Experience with React, Node.js, and MongoDB
Strong problem-solving skills
Excellent communication skills

featuredJobs.title: Frontend Developer
featuredJobs.description: Widget Corp. is seeking a Frontend Developer to work on our e-commerce platform. The ideal candidate will have experience with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
requirements: 2+ years of experience in frontend development
Experience with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
Familiarity with responsive design principles
Strong attention to detail

featuredJobs.title: Backend Developer
featuredJobs.description: Gadget Co. is seeking a Backend Developer to work on our web API. The ideal candidate will have experience with Java, Spring, and SQL databases.
requirements: 5+ years of experience in backend development
Experience with Java, Spring, and SQL databases
Familiarity with RESTful API design
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills

recentJobs.title: Mobile App Developer
recentJobs.description: Tech Startup is seeking a Mobile App Developer to work on our iOS and Android apps. The ideal candidate will have experience with Swift and Kotlin.
requirements: 2+ years of experience in mobile app development
Experience with Swift and Kotlin
Familiarity with mobile app design patterns
Strong collaboration and communication skills

recentJobs.title: Data Analyst
recentJobs.description: Analytics Inc. is seeking a Data Analyst to analyze and interpret data for our clients. The ideal candidate will have experience with SQL and data visualization tools.
requirements: 3+ years of experience in data analysis
Experience with SQL and data visualization tools
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
Excellent communication and presentation skills

recentJobs.title: DevOps Engineer
recentJobs.description: Cloud Services Co. is seeking a DevOps Engineer to manage our infrastructure and deployment pipelines. The ideal candidate will have experience with AWS, Docker, and Kubernetes.
requirements: 5+ years of experience in DevOps or related field
Experience with AWS, Docker, and Kubernetes
Strong understanding of CI/CD pipelines
Strong problem-solving and troubleshooting skills
